name: Invoker
title: Kael
lore: In its earliest, and some would say most potent form, magic was primarily the art of memory.

sunStrike.name: Sun Strike
sunStrike.description: Sends a beam of solar energy crashing down, dealing massive damage split among enemies in the area.

coldSnap.name: Cold Snap
coldSnap.description: Causes a target to freeze, receiving mini-stuns and damage whenever they take damage.

tornado.name: Tornado
tornado.description: Conjures a fast-moving tornado that lifts enemies into the air, disabling them.

chaosDefens.name: Deafening Blast
chaosDefens.description: Unleashes a mighty blast that knocks back, disarms, and damages all enemies.
